title: Spokes: Low to Medium Complexity
bullets: The Business Technologist — Role: Domain Expert (e.g., Supply Chain Analyst) using AI agents and low-code tools.
The Business Technologist — Focus: Rapid prototyping of local business logic. “Vibe coding” allows them to build 80% of the solution instantly.
The Analytics Team — Composition: Small squad of Business Technologists + Analytics Lead.

The Analytics Team — The “Analytics Lead”: The Semantic Modeler. Unlike Data Engineers who move raw data, the AE uses tools like Dataform to create data modeling pipelines that build the core data models used for analysis & ML.
notes: Dark navy gradient background. Large white title top-left with a thin horizontal divider line beneath spanning most of slide. Two rounded-rectangle cards below in a 2-column layout. Each card has a small icon at top-left (left: person/robot outline in cyan; right: chart/analytics icon in purple), a colored heading (cyan/purple), then body text in light gray with bold lead-in labels (Role/Focus/Composition/The “Analytics Lead” and bold 'Dataform'). Cards have subtle border and soft shadow; internal padding ~30-40px equivalent.
